person.persName: Edwin Ruthven Ray (Hickman County Court Clerk and attorney)

body.p: Residence: Clinton, Hickman County, KY. Kentucky-born clerk of the Hickman County Court. Born in Hickman County, son of Dennis Ray and Nancy Hays. Became studying law at age 25 (c1853). Admitted to the bar of Hickman County, where he practiced until the Civil War. Married Harriet M. Brown, 5 Jan 1854.
